analysis.description: amountTokenBought in GlobCoinTokenSale.calculateTokenAmount (/unique_contracts/0xaa2ac6ab664c9c021292753a9131af4221587476.sol#710) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xaa2ac6ab664c9c021292753a9131af4221587476.sol#340-355) does not use the value returned by external calls:
